climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: This Certified Refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, a minimum 90-day warranty, and may arrive in a generic box.
Find the perfect position with 6.5-degree forward or 22-degree backward tilt adjustments and a height adjustability range of 130mm (5.11-Inch)
An ultra-wide 178-degree viewing angle enables clear and easy sharing of your screen with multiple onlookers.
Aspect Ratio: Widescreen (16:9) Panel Type, Surface: In-plane switching, anti glare with hard coat 3H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Carefully packed with all parts including DisplayPort cables
reviews.reviewText: I was happy to find these better-quality Dell monitors for a fraction of the original price, and even more pleased with the thorough effort in protecting them in shipping.They are working as expected. I wish I could have requested the stands be omitted, since they went directly to my dual-mount arm, but overall this was a very good experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars MST/DP 1.2 does not work, shouldn't have trusted Dell to tell the truth.
reviews.reviewText: The monitor itself is fine, but dramatically overpriced for the picture quality. The primary purpose for buying this monitor is that it **supposedly** supports MST in DP 1.2. However, it absolutely does not, and unfortunately, I trusted Dell to 'stick to their word' and bought 2 of these monitors thinking they would support the dual monitor setup using MST. Upon trying for several days to get MST to work, I looked up online with a specific focus on MST support via DP1.2, and found that Dell basically lied and is blowing off all their customers who complain about it.Bottom line - if you're buying this monitor to use by itself or in a standard multi-monitor setup, then it's fine, albeit a bit overpriced. Picture quality is ok, the display controls are ok, the ports and connectivity options would be great (if they all worked). However, if you're buying it specifically to use with another MST-compatible monitor to get DP 1.2 pass-thru/daisy-chaining, you will be 100% disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent monitors - clear, sharp, high resolution, light weight, built-in USB hubs
reviews.reviewText: I love these Dell UltraSharp monitors. I have two on my sit/stand desk (a VariDesk Pro 30), and they are light enough to work well with the stand mechanism. Brightness, contrast, and resolution are excellent. I particularly appreciate that the monitor stands are fully flexible out of the box - you can get good ergonomics without having to purchase special stands. The screens can lower to 1.5" from the desktop, and raise to nearly 7". There is ample forward and backward tilt, as well as up to 90 degree rotation, all built in.I also really appreciate the built-in USB hubs, which enable me to greatly reduce the clutter of cables and devices on my desktop.Overall, these monitors are an excellent value. I was able to get them as refurbished. One had a flaw and I exchanged it without any issues. The replacement is perfect. I would definitely buy them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Totally a disaster that I received it in a plain box and the screen is even broken! Cable line doesn’t work to connect to my device too. It’s not worth for any penny and now I have to return it! How wasting of time!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good monitor
reviews.reviewText: Very good monitor. Lots of inputs and outputs. Reliable. I bought one about 2018 and a second one in February 2021. Works fine. No problems. Good price.

reviews.reviewText: Bought the renewed product but the scratches were heavy and visible. This should be classified as good condition not excellent.
